metadata.Plot: In late 19th century Vienna, Lena Smith, a naive peasant girl from Hungary, has a child by a corrupt young cavalry officer, and goes to work his house as a servant, hiding the truth from his unsympathetic father, while the son returns to his profligate ways. Robbed of her child first when he is a baby, and later when they are separated by the war, she suffers imprisonment, contempt, and shame in order to protect the child.
metadata.Writer: Jules Furthman, Julian Johnson, Samuel Ornitz
metadata.Actors: Esther Ralston, James Hall, Gustav von Seyffertitz
